item.title: Guillermo Cox: Viaje a la Patagonia
Thomas Falkner: A description of Patagonia
item.description: NOT Transcribed See pages 132-150, on Language.

item.title: Elias Herckmans: Vocabula Chilensia
item.description: Transcribed This is a vocabulary of some 515 words and phrases compiled by Dutch explorers and military men on a reconnaissance mission to Chile from their territories in Brazil. The expedition set out in January 1643 with Hendrik Brower as its admiral. The vice-admiral was one Elias Herckmans, Governor of Parahyba, who, upon Brower’s death in August 1643, took over the entire expedition. As the most senior officer on the expedition and chief negotiator with the local population, the vocabulary is attributed to him.
